channel.title: Rewrites on CONCISELY
channel.description: Recent content in Rewrites on CONCISELY

item.title: Mobile Muster
item.description:
Current Twitter Bio


MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry. It recycles for free all handsets, batteries, charges and accessories.




Minimum Rewrite: This rewrite 1) Fixes a typo, and 2) States the value proposition first and foremost; before the lengthy official title. *The exclamation marks are optional and replaceable with fullstops.


We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry.




Medium Rewrite: This Rewrite: 1) Fixes a typo. 2) States your value proposition first and foremost. 3) Replaces your long, official title with a *clickable call to action (clicks to Australia Post on Twitter). *The exclamation marks are optional and replaceable with fullstops.


We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! Get a free reply paid satchel from @auspost today. #MobileMuster
